bibl.title: The Date of the Commencement of the Prefecture of Avidius Heliodorus.
Proceedings of the Twelfth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Coles, Revel A.

bibl.note: Egypt Exploration Society (to be included in The Oxyrhynchus Papyri). Copy of an edict of Gaius Avidius Heliodorus. September 7th, 136 A.D. [= P. Oxy. XLI, 2954].
bibl.seg: Coles Revel A., The Date of the Commencement of the Prefecture of Avidius Heliodorus.
Proceedings of the Twelfth International Congress of Papyrology (Toronto, 1970) pp. 85-87.
